trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: データを提供、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: このクラスは継承できません。

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs クラスを使用して、イベントの値を指定、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>イベントを有効にすると、現在の要求に対するカスタムの Windows id を指定するとします</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>。

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: アクセスすることができます、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>のイベント、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>という名前のサブルーチンを指定することによってクラス**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET アプリケーションの Global.asax ファイル内</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule></xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>現在を使用して AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs オブジェクトを構築<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>に渡します、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 使用することができます、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>指定されている AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs オブジェクトのプロパティ、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名の id をカスタム値に設定するイベントです</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 値を指定しない場合、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>中にプロパティ、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント、<xref:System.Guid>を使用します</xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名の id は<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>ときにのみ、イベントが発生

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule><xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>現在<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>を使用してオブジェクト</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>を構築</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>する

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: これは、後、渡します、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>オブジェクトを**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: イベントのコンテキスト。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得またはユーザーの匿名識別子を設定します。

trans-unit.source: You can use the AnonymousID property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: AnonymousID プロパティを使用するには匿名の id を中にカスタム値に設定する、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the AnonymousID property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 中に AnonymousID プロパティの値を指定しないかどうか、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント、<xref:System.Guid>を使用します</xref:System.Guid>。

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名の id は<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>ときにのみ、イベントが発生

trans-unit.source: The anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: ユーザーの匿名識別子。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得、 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>の現在の HTTP 要求オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>へのアクセスを提供<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>、および<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>現在の要求オブジェクト</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A></xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>の現在の HTTP 要求オブジェクト。
